oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Enhancing the double exchange interaction in a mixed valence {V-III-V-II} pair: a theoretical perspective
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GHOSH, S
SINGH, SK
TEWARY, S
RAJARAMAN, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: BRIDGED DIVANADIUM COMPLEXES
TO-DELOCALIZED TRANSITION
HIGH-SPIN MOLECULES
ELECTRON DELOCALIZATION
MAGNETIC-PROPERTIES
DFT DESCRIPTION
GROUND-STATE
CLUSTERS
INTERPLAY
SYSTEMS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Combined DFT-TD-DFT methodology has been employed to fully characterise a mixed valence {V-II-V-III} complex of molecular formula [(PY5Me2)(2)V-2(m-5,6-dimethylbenzimidazolate)](4+). These calculations offer viable ways to enhance double-exchange parameters - a key ingredient in the synthesis of SMMs.
